title: I got FPS issues, please help someone
body:
Reinstalled LoL, reinstalled graphics, cleaned my pc from viruses, malware and dust(detailed cleaning with compressed air too) and I still have same lags ever since this new patch dropped.
I had 300+ fps easy uncapped, now I barely get 100-120 and its never steady

Please help I cant play the game anymore :P

replies.body:
A number of issues could be causing this to occur. It sounds like you've done a lot of maintenance on your system (more than most can say; pat yourself on the back!), but you could try out some other simple steps to increase FPS by following the steps [**in this guide**](http://riot.com/2dlHSAF). I myself and other players have found it to be really helpful.

Though it more often manifests as lag, another likely cause is Connection interference affecting your FPS, so make sure you are on a solid Connection by following [**these steps**](http://riot.com/12B7oac) as well. Better safe than sorry! Lemme know if either of these guides help you out; if not I can look for other potential solutions or get you an in depth assist from Tech Support! ^^

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1Cw0Aigz55k&t=143s

Watch this video. it should help you out. I don't get what you get anymore
im lucking if i have 5 fps your eyes can even register past like 60 but there has been a ligit issue with the last couple of patches and the hextech tool broke too so can't even fix it
